Class ConnectivityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.applicationservice.mapservices.connectivity.imp.ConnectivityService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConnectivityService

    public class ConnectivityService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConnectivityService
    The Class ConnectivityService. in this class connectivity service was added to check if there is any path between start and end

      boolean isTherePath(Position start, Position end, GridCellContentType[][] matrix)
      Check for validating if there is any path between start and end in this method we transform our grid that was built as GridCellType into an graph and after that we make a union between each nodes of graph that has a relation to their neighbors.

    • Method Detail

      • isTherePath

        public boolean isTherePath(Position start,
                           Position end,
                           GridCellContentType[][] matrix)
        Check for validating if there is any path between start and end in this method we transform our grid that was built as GridCellType into an graph and after that we make a union between each nodes of graph that has a relation to their neighbors.
        Specified by:
        isTherePath in interface IConnectivityService
        Parameters:
        start - as Position that represent the entrance point
        end - as Position that represent the exit point of aliens
        matrix - as GridCellContentType
        Returns:
        boolean it is true if there is a path

      • isRight

        public boolean isRight(GridCellContentType[][] matrix,
                       int i,
                       int j)
        Parameters:
        matrix - the matrix that we want for validating
        i - as int that shows the index of the node that we want to check if there is any neighbor in right or not
        j - as int that shows the index of the node that we want to check if there is any neighbor in right or not
        Returns:
        boolean that shows there is a connected neighbor in right place

        isRight(GridCellContentType[][], int, int)

        Parameters:
